actual_description: 'Move backwards' actions let the robot move backward to dodge the incoming bombs that might fall right in front of it.
'Move Forward' actions to let the robot move forward constantly and not fall off the edge of the left screen.

When earth receives a threat that a nearby colony of aliens is about to launch an attack, it sends a small spy robot to check onto the closest enemy base out of many to check their weapon advances and preparations.
The player controls when to jump and when to move forward or backward.
After the first minute, the game gets more intense, with bombs raining down on our poor little robot and many mobs spawning to stop our little hero.
Our army can walk through and defeat the base if the robot succeeds in its mission.
The robot will be running in the forward direction.
The robot's main objective is to find and hack the system that can 'Disable' the 'weaponries', which can be found at the end of each level that can be attained after going a certain distance.
When the robot's cover gets blown, the whole army chases our little robot to stop him from his mission.

After running for a certain distance or given time, the level will be cleared, and the robot will move on to the second phase to chase robots away or press the self-destruct button, which destroys the enemy base at the end of each level.

The player will control the character with basic controls specified at the beginning of the game or which will hover around on the screen basically just four controls (Jump, move forward, move backward, duck).
